start.state: Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
You lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I won't lose then!

Is that so? Interesting. Let's get on with it then.
So you lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I can't lose then!
